languages.text: {n}Сведя кудлатые брови, мужчина решительно тычет в вашу сторону стволом своего огнестрельного недоразумения.{/n} "Бреши больше! Чей-то {mf|Егойная|Еейная} Светлость забыл{mf||а} в таком змеюшни... Ой, Боженька-Император!"

{n}The man furrows his shaggy eyebrows and pokes his travesty of a firearm in your direction.{/n} "Trynna pull a fast one on me, eh? Like {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'d go wandering about this here swamp... Gah! Emperor almighty!"
languages.original_text: {n}Сведя кудлатые брови, мужчина решительно тычет в вашу сторону стволом своего огнестрельного недоразумения.{/n} "Бреши больше! Чей-то {mf|Егойная|Еейная} Светлость забыл{mf||а} в таком змеюшни... Ой, Боженька-Император!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The old man furrows his shaggy eyebrows and pokes his travesty of a firearm in your direction.{/n} "Trynna pull a fast one on me, eh? Like {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'d go wandering about this here deathtrap... Gah! Emperor almighty!"
traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.locale_text: {n}The man furrows his shaggy eyebrows and pokes his travesty of a firearm in your direction.{/n} "Trynna pull a fast one on me, eh? Like {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'d go wandering about this here swamp... Gah! Emperor almighty!"
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}老人皱了皱毛茸茸的眉毛，手里那把破枪对准了你。{/n}“你是想耍我吗？那么尊贵的{mf|老爷|夫人}，怎么会在这片破沼泽里到处乱跑……呸！帝皇在上！”
languages.original_text: {n}The man furrows his shaggy eyebrows and pokes his travesty of a firearm in your direction.{/n} "Trynna pull a fast one on me, eh? Like {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'d go wandering about this here swamp... Gah! Emperor almighty!"

traits.locale_text: {n}老人皱了皱毛茸茸的眉毛，手里那把破枪对准了你。{/n}“你是想耍我吗？那么尊贵的{mf|老爷|夫人}，怎么会在这片破沼泽里到处乱跑……呸！帝皇在上！”
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}男はボサボサの眉をひそめ、銃をあなたに向かって突きつけた。{/n} 「俺を騙そうとしてんのかぁ、あぁ？陛下が、この困難な状況をさまよってるように…ケッ！皇帝よ！」
languages.original_text: {n}The man furrows his shaggy eyebrows and pokes his travesty of a firearm in your direction.{/n} "Trynna pull a fast one on me, eh? Like {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'d go wandering about this here swamp... Gah! Emperor almighty!"

traits.locale_text: {n}男はボサボサの眉をひそめ、銃をあなたに向かって突きつけた。{/n} 「俺を騙そうとしてんのかぁ、あぁ？陛下が、この困難な状況をさまよってるように…ケッ！皇帝よ！」
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}El anciano frunce su poblado ceño y agita su mal llamada arma hacia ti.{/n} «¿Intentas jugármela? Como si mi{mf|lord|lady} fuera a pasear por este pantano infec... ¡Emperador santísimo!».
languages.original_text: {n}The man furrows his shaggy eyebrows and pokes his travesty of a firearm in your direction.{/n} "Trynna pull a fast one on me, eh? Like {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'d go wandering about this here swamp... Gah! Emperor almighty!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano frunce su poblado ceño y agita su mal llamada arma hacia ti.{/n} «¿Intentas jugármela? Como si mi{mf|lord|lady} fuera a pasear por este pantano infec... ¡Emperador santísimo!».
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Der Mann runzelt die Stirn und richtet seine Farce von Schusswaffe in deine Richtung.{/n} "Ihr wollt mich übers Ohr hauen, was? Als würde {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} je in diesem Sumpf herumspazieren ... Gah! Allmächtiger Imperator!"
languages.original_text: {n}The man furrows his shaggy eyebrows and pokes his travesty of a firearm in your direction.{/n} "Trynna pull a fast one on me, eh? Like {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'d go wandering about this here swamp... Gah! Emperor almighty!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann runzelt die Stirn und richtet seine Farce von Schusswaffe in deine Richtung.{/n} "Ihr wollt mich übers Ohr hauen, was? Als würde {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} je in diesem Sumpf herumspazieren ... Gah! Allmächtiger Imperator!"
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Le vieil homme fronce ses sourcils broussailleux et braque son arme de fortune sur vous.{/n} « Elle est bien bonne ! Vous voulez me faire croire que Sa Seigneurie viendrait se balader dans ce maréc... Gah ! Par l'Empereur tout puissant ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The man furrows his shaggy eyebrows and pokes his travesty of a firearm in your direction.{/n} "Trynna pull a fast one on me, eh? Like {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'d go wandering about this here swamp... Gah! Emperor almighty!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieil homme fronce ses sourcils broussailleux et braque son arme de fortune sur vous.{/n} « Elle est bien bonne ! Vous voulez me faire croire que Sa Seigneurie viendrait se balader dans ce maréc... Gah ! Par l'Empereur tout puissant ! »
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: {n}Adam, gür kaşlarını çatıp elindeki silah demeye bin şahit isteyen mekanizmayı sana doğrultuyor.{/n} "Sen de bizi mi kekliyorsun ha? {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin böyle bataklık yerde ne işi varmış? Peh! İmparator adına!"
languages.original_text: {n}The man furrows his shaggy eyebrows and pokes his travesty of a firearm in your direction.{/n} "Trynna pull a fast one on me, eh? Like {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'d go wandering about this here swamp... Gah! Emperor almighty!"
